page.title: 04SCHOOL
page.content:
{Ruyton XI Towns Primary School
The school named St.John the Baptist was a National School built in the village in I8I9. Basically the school building is original although modifications were made in I968 and I977. Inside, the classrooms have been refurbished to facilitate the contemporary needs of everyday education. Adjoining the school is a small hard surface playground and a school playing field is situated in the village,I/4 mile away. There are two classes in the Junior Department of mixed age and ability and the infant class is also of mixed age and abilities.
